sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Under Age Veterans Benefits Act.

sections.heading: No veteran entitled to benefits under the provisions of the
sections.text:
Title 38 of the United States Code, "Veterans Benefits", or under the
provisions of Acts supplementary thereto or amendatory thereof, nor the
spouse of any such veteran, shall be deemed solely by reason of the
minority of such veteran or spouse to be under disability to make any
contract authorized by such law, nor shall any such contract made by such
veteran or spouse be invalid or voidable by reason of the minority of such
veteran or spouse.
